channel.title: 562 shop making any why is my server always offline?
channel.description: ok so I wanted to add a couple of shops to my 562 its a runeslay base how would I do this? also my server is always offline so i registered a new server with runelocus and it says online 100% HurrAYYYYY then 45min-2 hours later it says offline I didnt change anything and it never goes back online this has happened with three different servers im 90% sure im doing everything right ive portforwarded I have no-ip and its working (i think...) and my server works No one can seem to figure out the problem and if anyone could at least point me in the right direction it would be sooooooooo awesome thanks in advance also I am new to vps's and I was hoping for some suggestions of an affordable vps that's easy to use an can host a 562 rsps anyone know one?

item.title: 562 shop making any why is my server always offline?
item.dc:creator: @aerodude30 aerodude30
item.description:
@aerodude30 wrote:

ok so I wanted to add a couple of shops to my 562 its a runeslay base how would I do this? also my server is always offline so i registered a new server with runelocus and it says online 100% HurrAYYYYY then 45min-2 hours later it says offline I didnt change anything and it never goes back online this has happened with three different servers im 90% sure im doing everything right ive portforwarded I have no-ip and its working (i think…) and my server works No one can seem to figure out the problem and if anyone could at least point me in the right direction it would be sooooooooo awesome thanks in advance also I am new to vps’s and I was hoping for some suggestions of an affordable vps that’s easy to use an can host a 562 rsps anyone know one?
